description: runtime: add atomics to fix arm

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

LGTM.

Russ, could you please mark all arm builds in the dashboard as failed
so that we can free the builders from endless waiting until timeout
(some builders have at least 2h timeout).

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c48cbf17e4f7 ***

runtime: add atomics to fix arm
